column5: It's been far too long, but Brook was happy! Of course so was my daughter. We all went fishing this past Sunday (along with daughter's boyfriend) in my boat which has been dry docked for 3 and a half years (sadly).  Fishing was slow but the weather was beauty. Daughter out fished both her Dad and boyfriend, nothing earth shattering in size or numbers but it didn't have to be, it was the "just being out there" kind of day for all of us.  I'm sure I'll get more pics in my email but for now all I have this.
That's what it's all about , quality time with good people and a pet.  Can't believe that beautiful boat you have has sat for 3 and a half years.  Thanks for sharing!

I'm pretty sure I still have some of Brook's hair on my fleece jacket from the last time we fished together.LOL  I also have nightmares of sharing the same room with Cliff and having a black lab licking my feet at 2am in the morning.  Great to see you finally got out
Glad to hear both you and the boat, along with Brook, and your daughter of course, sounds like it's been way too long.  No surprise the girl out fished the boys though  Maureen
You spelled your dogs name wrong again it is BROOKE.   Art
Ya ya ya....  Now get back to your room and tie up some more rods....
A few more pictures from my daughters camera, finally.

Nice to be on the water at this time of year, especially with people you are close to. Those are some nice pics there Spiel, saved the black and white. Your girl has a good eye.  How's that mobile 5 star hotel working out? All the comforts of home, just don't crawl in the back for a nap and put her in cruise control.
